job.title: AI/ML - Sr Machine Learning Engineer, Machine Intelligence
job.description: brstrongSummarybrstrong brWe are looking for engineers with a passion for using machine learning to create intelligent applications Be part of a highly accomplished deeply technical and close knit team of machine learning engineers you will build infrastructures tools and develop machine learning applications to empower the the transformation of Apple business by using AIMLbrbrbrYou will also have the opportunity to contribute to every cool project around Apple and use your machine learning skills to transfer your ideas into solutions for some of the challenging technical problems in the next generation of products that will delight millions of peoplebrbr brstrongKey Qualificationsbrstrong brDriven projects from inception to production experience with partnering with other technical and business stakeholdersbrbrDemonstrated technical leadership through influence and mentoringbrbrComfortable working in earlier stages of product development with ambiguous requirementsbrbrA passion for making simple robust and scalable platforms used by other engineering teamsbrbrStrong software development skills with proficiency in relevant languages ex Go Python Java CbrbrTechnical skills and experience in distributed systems and web services in a production settingbrbrSolid knowledge of various ML technologies especially in the Computer Vision domainbrbr brstrongDescriptionbrstrong brAs a Senior Software engineer you have the following responsibilitiesbrbrbr The architecture design development and operations of systems designed for running machine learning workloads across all of Apple These may include but not limited to data management systems engineering workflow systems distributed compute systems and their web portal amp web service componentsbrbr Partner with various teams and machine learning engineers across different Apple organizations to define high impact product features and deliver them with qualitybrbr We are looking for someone who collaborates effectively on a team and thrives in a fastpaced highly fluid environmentbrbr brstrongAdditional Requirementsbrstrong brApple is an Equal Opportunity Employer that is committed to inclusion and diversity We also take affirmative action to offer employment and advancement opportunities to all applicants including minorities women protected veterans and individuals with disabilities Apple will not discriminate or retaliate against applicants who inquire about disclose or discuss their compensation or that of other applicantsbrbr brRole Number 200274618brbr
